meaningMnemonic: If you get there <kanji>previous</kanji> to something rotating (回り), you are <vocabulary>arriving ahead</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>going ahead</vocabulary> in <vocabulary>anticipation</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This consists of a couple kun'yomi readings put together. You can tell it's kun'yomi because of the hiragana sticking out at the end. In previous levels, you learned both the words 先 and 回る (verb version of 回り). If you know those, you should be able to put them together to learn the reading of this word as well.
